name: cbd-events
author: Secretariat of the Convention on Biological Diversity <it@cbd.int>

scripts.build:ios: rm -rf .nuxt && rm -rf cordova/www/* && NODE_ENV=ios nuxt generate && replace '/nuxt/' 'nuxt/' cordova/www -r && cd cordova && cordova build ios --buildFlag='-UseModernBuildSystem=0' && cordova platform remove ios && cordova platform add ios
scripts.build:android: rm -rf .nuxt && NODE_ENV=android nuxt generate && replace '/nuxt/' 'nuxt/' cordova/www -r && cd cordova && cordova build android && cordova platform remove android && cordova platform add android
scripts.clean-reinstall: rm -f yarn.lock && rm -f package-lock.json &&  rm -rf node_modules && CXXFLAGS="--std=c++17" yarn install --force
